headline: Change Foods Secures Funding for Animal-Free Dairy
summary: Change Foods receives investment to scale precision-fermentation for dairy alternatives, aiming for cost parity.

headline: Modern Meadow Announces Bio-Based Material Partnership
summary: Modern Meadow collaborates to expand applications of their biofabricated materials in various industries.

headline: Solar Foods Opens First Commercial Solein Facility
summary: Solar Foods commences production at its first commercial facility for Solein, a protein made from air.

headline: Bolt Threads Mylo Material Used in New Adidas Collection
summary: Adidas releases a new collection featuring Mylo, Bolt Threads' mushroom-based leather alternative.

headline: Perfect Day Announces New Ice Cream Launch
summary: Perfect Day expands its portfolio with a new ice cream product featuring their animal-free dairy protein.

headline: BioMason Secures Funding to Scale Sustainable Cement
summary: BioMason raises capital to expand production of their bio-based cement alternative.

headline: Air Protein Announces Partnership with Food Manufacturer
summary: Air Protein partners with a major food manufacturer to develop new air-based protein products.

headline: Piñatex Featured in New Car Interior Design
summary: Piñatex, a pineapple leaf fiber material, is incorporated into the interior design of a new car model.

headline: Nature's Fynd Expands Distribution of Fy Protein Products
summary: Nature's Fynd broadens the availability of its Fy protein-based food products to more retailers.

headline: Algiknit Develops New Algae-Based Yarn for Textiles
summary: Algiknit announces advancements in its algae-derived yarn for sustainable textile applications.
